item.title: Comparison between Several Desktop Speakers
item.description: In this post, I would like to compare several speakers that are relatively small in size and are suitable as desktop speakers.

item.title: Macbook 外接显示器
item.description: 最近趁着黑五入手了外接显示器，顺便了解了一下显示器相关的各种标准和技术，本文做一个总结。
